Html:
Hi,
i have a problem with my hunter's crit chance. In Rawr my crit chance is 28,84% but in-game its actually 29,44%. I think its issue with base crit chance, because agility and crit rating is the same in Rawr and in-game or maybe im doin something wrong :P
cheers,
Mohdar, Hellfire [EU]

p.s. keep up the good work :)

The default target level in the options panel is 73.  Targets that are a higher level then you have crit reduction.  The paper doll crit rating is against targets that are the same level as you.  If you adjust the target level to 70, the crit rating will match what you see in game.
